### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#13932](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/13932.html) (Additional utility RPCs for PSBT by achow10
Is this redundant for all possible code paths that lead to `GetPubKey`?
@laanwj It's the only instance of it, yes.
so this is `SignStep` that calls `GetPubKey` then `CreateSig`?\nI see, utACK https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/14678/commits/f7beb95a1f921ed292680fbd2f042b4bac73bf59
made `sigdata` const to make the intention of function clearer
